thread.title: Disney Parks Blog Main Street Electrical Parade Meet-Up Lights Up the Night at Disneyland Park
thread.title_full: Disney Parks Blog Main Street Electrical Parade Meet-Up Lights Up the Night at Disneyland Park

author: Erin Glover
title: Disney Parks Blog Main Street Electrical Parade Meet-Up Lights Up the Night at Disneyland Park
text:
Last night, 200 of our readers celebrated the limited-time return of a Disneyland park original at our Disney Parks Blog Main Street Electrical Parade Meet-Up .
The evening began with colorful, glowing dessert reception featuring some of the sweet treats now available during the run of Main Street Electrical Parade at Disneyland park.

Guests also had the opportunity to pose for photos alongside our Main Street Electrical Parade court dancers as well as Mickey Mouse himself.

Then, fans stepped inside the Fantasyland Theatre for a panel discussion with Robyn Vossen, General Manager, Disneyland Entertainment Operations; John Addis, Show Director, Disneyland Creative Entertainment; and Bruce Healey, Principal Music Producer, Disneyland Creative Entertainment.
This magical evening ended, of course, with reserved viewing of the Main Street Electrical Parade. Thanks to all who attended!
